title: First discussion of 2016 ranked season
body:
Come say hello{{champion:35}}

EDIT:
Go for a shot at a $20 Steam gift card at https://www.facebook.com/Gekkoh-Giveaways-175444466144365/
This is not a scam, let's be real, i would be sending you to a survey or some shit to waste your time if it was, but i'm not interested in doing that, so why not give it a go, there will be daily giveaways if the page gets enough likes.

replies.body: Just woke up =) good luck everyone in 2016! may the force be with you
And the race to challenger begins!
Honestly Riot when you say it will be up January 20 00:00:00...MAKE IT UP BY THAT TIME! Please for the love of Go{{champion:77}}

> [{quoted}](name=Renek Yourself,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=ratvQB8J,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-01-19T13:01:37.416+0000)
>
> Come say hello{{champion:35}}

cant wiat man
Cant wait for gold {{champion:16}}
Anyone know when the ranked queues will be back up?

> [{quoted}](name=gvT Trust,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=ratvQB8J,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-01-19T13:05:08.527+0000)
>
> Anyone know when the ranked queues will be back up?

not sure man, knowing riot it could take a day...{{item:1001}}
I'm actually so excited. Someone control me plz.
Annnnnd they're up
Not having ranked is making me {{champion:75}} . And now my stomach ache is {{champion:15}} !
anyone else wish they were {{champion:26}}  to make the wait faster
IS THE NEW CHAMP SELECT COMING TOO?

> [{quoted}](name=B3nno,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=ratvQB8J,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-01-19T13:11:15.752+0000)
>
> IS THE NEW CHAMP SELECT COMING TOO?

Yea dude{{champion:115}}
FUCK YEAH BOYS TIME TO GETCHO GRIND ON!!!
OMG YESSSS
So pumped! I only started playing ranked again about 2-3 weeks ago (made it from Gold 3 to Plat 5 :D) so I'm excited to see how far I can make it this season!

I'm looking forward to the slow but impending realisation that Dynamic Queue just won't work on small servers like OCE, followed by rapid backpedalling, excuse-making and Riot "I have a PHD" Lyte making up numbers about toxicity.

Riot "literally indisputable" Games.

Not spending any more money on this game until we get Ranked Teams back and an actual solo queue (and yes, I'm aware the latter is in the works).
So i just started playing solo Q again with the new season and i have been kick about 4 times now just cause i didnt lock in my champ yay 30min q time ftw @Riot

Well this is how I feel about that... http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/7RncTIpf-the-end-of-competitive-league-of-legends

5 years, 4 accounts, over 10,000 games, $1,500 all down the drain.
Well first things first I need to GET to Lvl30, then I'll probably play 1 game of placements then realise how hard it is and then not come back to ranked until...sometime in the future:/
Please, lock in... And pick your champ at the start so you don't complain it gets banned. On another note. GOOD LUCK FOR 2016!~ {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I'm Gold but i can't duo with a plat for my placements..?
But i was Silver at the end of season 5 and got gold during the preseason. Does this have to do with anything?

My goals for the season:

1. Grind to level 30
2. Grind to Diamond

;)
Its up with queue sim 2016 boys
Good luck in placements all!!! {{champion:17}}

Annnnnd my first ranked game of the new season starts with a bang: been waiting 16 minutes for a game where someone doesn't not lock in a champ...
New draft pick gonna take a lot of getting used to
ITS HERE
It's up boys!
WHAT TIME DOES THIS RANK CRAP COME BACK UP?
4am
where'd you find this out?
yer, where was this info?
I think we need to patch if the new champion select is coming, just some small one I think.
Hello, do you know what time the new season is getting reset ?
The answer is still the same as it was two minutes ago - we do not know.

> [{quoted}](name=BrotherHood3192,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=ratvQB8J,comment-id=0012,timestamp=2016-01-19T13:47:10.230+0000)
>
> you guys could probabaly watch this while you're waiting :/                         
>  https://youtu.be/AHn7vcty7oo

it's not what it looks like, dont worry ;)

well i got out of bronze 5 before end of season ;D
still a bronze pleb -_-

Should i stay up all morning and wait for queues or not :P
{{item:3070}}
rito pls{{champion:32}}
So is ranked out yet?
Not yet mate
Damn when is it out?

> [{quoted}](name=Subaru WRX,realm=OCE,application-id=6jGZAhT1,discussion-id=ratvQB8J,comment-id=000e00000000,timestamp=2016-01-19T13:36:52.134+0000)
>
> Damn when is it out?

No clue {{champion:32}}
im keen on the new champ select and the hextech crafting
{{champion:35}}
